mapper.insert: insert into sys_dept_posi (dept_code, posi_code, posi_name, dept_posi, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptPosi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_dept_posi set posi_name = #{posiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_posi = #{deptPosi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dept_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and posi_code = #{posiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select dept_code, posi_code, posi_name, dept_posi,create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_dept_posi
